Portrait of Charlotte of Belgium, Empress of Mexico, Grand Master of the Order of Saint Charleslabel QS:Len,"Portrait of Charlotte of Belgium, Empress of Mexico, Grand Master of the Order of Saint Charles"


Object type

paintingobject_type QS:P31,Q3305213


Description


English:  This copy of the original does not appear in "The Winterhalter Catalogue". It differs from the Winterhalter original version from Hearst Castle, as the subject has a different shoulder decoration, sash, and dress colouring. The Graefle copy, painted for Queen Victoria, copies the original but has a different tiara.

1864date QS:P571,+1864-00-00T00:00:00Z/9

metadata.og:title: File:Dell'Acqua Arrival of Empress Elisabeth in Miramare.jpg - Wikimedia Commons

text:
DescriptionDell'Acqua Arrival of Empress Elisabeth in Miramare.jpg

Visit of Empress Elisabeth at the Castello di Miramare 1861; Charlotte of Belgium (in white dress) welcomes Elisabeth while her husband Emperor Franz Joseph I. and his brother Ferdinand Maximilian wait on the boat


Date

1865


Source

Historical Museum of Castello di Miramare (Trieste)
